question: Government plans to construct an airport in your locality. Write a letter to the authority. - Explain where you came to know about the news. - Describe the negative effects of airport construction. - Ask to consider alternate sits for the airport construction.
text: I am writing this letter to you to draw your attention to this new decision about constructing a new airport in our area.
Actually, last week in the morning when I walking on Soleymani street, I found a group of architects was making a site plan for the airport and evaluating all aspects.

Firstly, due to some reasons, I believe this construction had a bad effect on this neighbourhood. One of them is the place that you were considered for the airport is near the public hospital. In addition, I am completely sure the new airport creates a traffic jam in this area because currently, we have intensive traffic there.
Due to these tips, I will expect you to evaluate exactly again and review all options and consider another place for your decision.
Thank you for taking your time and your consideration of my letter. I looking forward to hearing news about construction in another place.
